statements: UPDATE decentralized_identity_system SET private_key = 'new_private_key_value' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE decentralized_identity_system SET blockchain_address = 'new_blockchain_address_value', username = 'new_username_value' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE decentralized_identity_system SET private_key = 'new_private_key_value', blockchain_address = 'updated_blockchain_address' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE decentralized_identity_system SET public_key = 'new_public_key_value', username = 'updated_username' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE blockchain_users SET public_key='sample_public_key_1', is_verified=true, username='user1' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE identity_credentials SET credential_type='email', credential_data='user1@example.com' WHERE user_id=101;
UPDATE blockchain_users SET is_verified = true, username = 'alice' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE identity_credentials SET credential_data = 'updated data', credential_type = 'updated credentials' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', public_key='newpublickey' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE identities SET identity_type='newtype', identity_data='{"new_data": "value"}' WHERE identity_id=2;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com', public_key='mypublickey' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE identities SET identity_type='newtype', identity_data='{"key":"value"}' WHERE identity_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE identities SET verified = TRUE WHERE identity_id = 3;
UPDATE users SET username = 'john_doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE identites SET verified = TRUE, identity_data = '{"verified": true}' WHERE identity_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email='newemail@example.com' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE documents SET document_name='New Document Name', document_hash='abcdefgh123456' WHERE doc_id=2;
UPDATE users SET public_key = 'new_public_key_value' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE access_requests SET request_status = 'approved' WHERE document_id = 3 AND requester_id = 2;
